医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
邻里贫困和社区暴力的压力影响黑人青少年的心理健康很容易想象，在一个有安全、干净的公园、几乎没有歧视、而且人们没有经济困难的社区长大，会带来一个压力较小的童年。相比之下，社区空间稀少、暴力和贫困的社区会给儿童创造一个压力更大的生活环境。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Stress-of-neighborhood-poverty-and-community-violence-affects-Black-adolescents-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Stress-of-neighborhood-poverty-and-community-violence-affects-Black-adolescents-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1299fcd-72cf-429c-a36a-143019ac07e6 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 00:59:23 -0400 Stress of neighborhood poverty and community violence affects Black adolescents' mental health
快速检测可以确定严重哮喘的关键驱动因素是否存在麦克马斯特大学和汉密尔顿圣约瑟夫医疗保健中心的研究人员数十年来致力于揭示哮喘和其他呼吸系统疾病的潜在机制，他们制作了一种简单、快速的测试，可以识别严重哮喘的关键驱动因素的存在。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Rapid-test-could-define-the-existence-of-a-key-driver-of-severe-asthma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Rapid-test-could-define-the-existence-of-a-key-driver-of-severe-asthma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cd5e1b84-df8e-4043-a4ce-46fc74688b2a Wed, 02 Aug 2023 00:43:22 -0400 Rapid test could determine the existence of a key driver of severe asthma
揭示额顶网络注意力处理机制几乎一半的右脑中风患者后来会出现一种非常不寻常的症状：他们失去了感知左侧空间正在发生的事情的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Uncovering-the-mechanisms-of-attention-processing-in-frontoparietal-networks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Uncovering-the-mechanisms-of-attention-processing-in-frontoparietal-networks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5396d75-b405-4f5d-bcef-776d5a5acedd Wed, 02 Aug 2023 00:26:14 -0400 Uncovering the mechanisms of attention processing in frontoparietal networks
2020 年 4 月，美国 COVID-19 大流行期间，成人癌症诊断减少了一半美国癌症协会 (ACS) 研究人员的一项新研究发现，2020 年 4 月，在美国 COVID-19 大流行期间，每月成人癌症诊断量减少了一半。下降幅度最大的是 I 期癌症，导致晚期诊断的比例更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Adult-cancer-diagnoses-reduced-by-half-in-April-2020-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-in-the-US。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230802/Adult-cancer-diagnoses-reduced-by-half-in-April-2020-during-the-COVID-19-pandemic-in-the-US。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=efc4d039-388c-4e98-a126-cf1b8652ad39 Wed, 02 Aug 2023 00:00:13 -0400 Adult cancer diagnoses reduced by half in April 2020 during the COVID-19 pandemic in the U.S
研究加深了对调节性 T 细胞产生治疗益处的了解数十年的研究留下了关于调节免疫系统的细胞的知识空白：普渡大学和美国国立卫生研究院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-offers-deeper-understanding-of-regulatory-T-cells-yielding-therapeutic-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Study-offers-deeper-understanding-of-regulatory-T-cells-yielding-therapeutic-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7331ea66-23c7-41cc-af7e-fe183e9541ab Tue, 01 Aug 2023 23:51:00 -0400 Study offers deeper understanding of regulatory T cells yielding therapeutic benefits
纽约大学 Langone Health 入选 2023-24 年度 20 强医院荣誉榜纽约大学朗格健康中心因其对特殊主义的坚定承诺，再次在《美国新闻与世界报道》年度“最佳医院”排名中脱颖而出，并入选 2023-24 年度 20 强医院荣誉榜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/NYU-Langone-Health-included-on-the-2023-24-Honor-Roll-of-top-20-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/NYU-Langone-Health-included-on-the-2023-24-Honor-Roll-of-top-20-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc81ffd8-606f-48df-bfca-6e4922045671 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:37:00 -0400 NYU Langone Health included on the 2023-24 Honor Roll of top 20 hospitals
非侵入性脑刺激有望治疗儿童多动症萨里大学和耶路撒冷希伯来大学联合领导的新研究表明，非侵入性脑刺激与认知训练相结合，可以显着改善儿童注意力缺陷多动障碍（ADHD）的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Non-induced-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Non-induced-brain-stimulation-shows-promise-for-treating-ADHD-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a71fab97-dbe4-42ac-afd1-fca098933ae8 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:34:00 -0400 Non-invasive brain stimulation shows promise for treating ADHD in children
研究表明山核桃可能有助于预防肥胖和减少炎症德克萨斯 A&M AgriLife 科学家的一项合作研究表明，每天食用山核桃可以预防肥胖以及脂肪肝和糖尿病等一系列相关的健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Pecans-may-help-prevent-obesity-and-reduce-inflammation-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Pecans-may-help-prevent-obesity-and-reduce-inflammation-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7104c35-6a5a-48bc-ad93-1828e7866504 Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:33:00 -0400 Pecans may help prevent obesity and reduce inflammation, study shows
人工智能支持的乳房 X 光检查可以挽救生命并减少放射科医生的工作量人工智能 (AI) 支持的乳房 X 光检查是当今放射科医生传统双读的安全替代方案，可以减轻医生的繁重工作量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/AI-supported-mammography-screening-could-save-lives-and-reduce-workload-for-radiologies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/AI-supported-mammography-screening-could-save-lives-and-reduce-workload-for-radiologies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7b5be15-ce85-4612-96c7-57f3ac7f138c Tue, 01 Aug 2023 22:29:00 -0400 AI-supported mammography screening could save lives and reduce workload for radiologists
肾脏健康指标的长期模式可以预测心力衰竭风险他们说，一分预防胜于一分治疗。了解对哪个患者采取哪种预防性治疗无疑可以提高这一效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Long-term-patterns-in-kidney-health-indicators-may-predict-heart-failure-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230801/Long-term-patterns-in-kidney-health-indicators-may-predict-heart-failure-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b9c3361-b605-4c22-b42a-6d7b666da86e Tue, 01 Aug 2023 21:59:00 -0400 Long-term patterns in kidney health indicators may predict heart failure risk
